Publish.LongDescription:
### 🚨 PLEASE READ THE USAGE | KNOWN LIMITATIONS SECTIONS 🚨
👷🏻 Want to bring traditional Chinese architecture to life? This pack is for you!
### 🎨 About the Pack The Chinese Brick Relief Decal Pack brings a touch of history and culture to Cities: Skylines II! Inspired by intricate brick carvings found in ancient temples, courtyards, and historic streets, these high-quality decals allow you to create authentic Chinese-inspired builds.
Whether you're building a traditional village, an ancient city wall, a temple complex, or adding cultural charm to modern structures, these detailed relief patterns will elevate your designs.
### 📦 Contents of the Pack ✅ 20+ high-resolution brick relief decals with authentic carvings ✅ Various designs, including floral motifs, mythological creatures, geometric patterns, and calligraphy ✅ Ideal for temples, historic streets, courtyards, gates and walls ✅ Located in the “DECALS” tab for easy access
### 🔨 Usage 🛠️ Recommended mods for best results: Move It, Extra Decals Tool, Procedural Objects, and Adaptive Networks 🖌️ Apply decals to walls, floors, and other surfaces to recreate a historical look 🏗️ Mix and match with other assets to blend tradition into modern designs
### 🛑 Known Limitations 🚧 Some decals may slightly overlap textures due to the game's layering system 🏗️ Decals may not conform perfectly to curved or sloped surfaces 🎨 Color variations may differ depending on your graphics settings
### 🌐 Localization - English - Chinese Simplified - Chinese Traditional
💡 Want to take your city to the next level? Try combining these decals with traditional Chinese architecture assets for a truly immersive experience!
### 💬 Questions? Need help? Drop a comment!
If you're reading this, you just unlocked the achievement "Architect of Tradition" 🏯. Congratulations! 🎉
